item.title: Scrolling the map
item.description: Sometimes in your game you’ll have to scroll the map when your character moves to some new position. For some games the scrolling creates a really significant part of user experience; I’d recommend to read this article just to understand how important it is.

item.title: Working with different screen sizes
item.description: In one of the first articles, I’ve recommended to remove from the default AppDelegate.cpp file everything related to work with multiple screen resolutions.

item.title: Screen size
item.description: We have already learned now to add objects to the screen and how to do some things with them; that’s enough for a simple games. But there is one more thing left unexplained about our default program and this is the screen size.
